name: list_merchants
description: Lists available Paylo storefronts with metadata.

name: search_products
description: Searches for products across all merchants or within a specific store.

arguments.name: merchantId
arguments.desc: Optional: Filter by a specific merchant ID

name: get_product_details
description: Gets full details (price, description, stock) for a product.

arguments.name: productId
arguments.desc: The ID of the product to retrieve

name: create_order
description: Creates a pending order for a list of items.

arguments.name: items
arguments.desc: List of items to purchase (productId, quantity, variantId)

name: generate_payment_link
description: Generates a checkout URL for a specific order.

arguments.name: orderId
arguments.desc: The ID of the order to pay for

name: check_payment_status
description: Verifies if an order has been paid.
